brewery.name: Acadian Farms
brewery.description: Nestled in the fertile Carson valley, Acadian Farms is a small family farm and nano-brewery. We believe the old adage, "You are what you eat", so we organically raise our vegetables and animals. We use certified organic barley & malt in our beers and we bake our artisan breads with all natural and/or organic flours from Bob's Red Mill.  Our farmstead cheeses are made with raw milk from grass-fed goats at a local dairy. We invite you out to the farm for a pint and views of the beautiful Columbia River Gorge!
